bibl.title: New Epigrams of Palladas: A Fragmentary Papyrus Codex (P.CtYBR inv. 4000)
bibl.publisher: North Carolina, American Society of Papyrologists (Diffusion: Oxbow Books)
bibl.note: P.CtYBR [= P. Yale] Inv. 4000, purchased in 1996. Provenance unknown, first half of the fourth century. - Preface. - Introduction: A. Codicological Reconstruction (Robert G. Babcock); - B. Paleography (Ruth Duttenhöfer); - C. Orthography and Other Scribal Characteristics (K.W.W.); - D. Contents of the Codex (K.W.W.); - E. Metrics (Akihiko Watanabe); - F. Authorship and Date (K.W.W.); - G. Historical Notes (K.W.W.). - Note on Editorial Procedure. - Diplomatic Transcription, Paleographical Notes, and Text. - Commentary. - References. Indexes.
bibl.seg: Kevin W. Wilkinson, New Epigrams of Palladas: A Fragmentary Papyrus Codex (P.CtYBR inv. 4000) = American Studies in Papyrology. 52.
Durham, North Carolina, American Society of Papyrologists (Diffusion: Oxbow Books), 2012, 4°, 214 pp. et 12 pll. ISBN 978-0-9799758-5-1. $50.

P.CtYBR [= P. Yale] Inv. 4000, purchased in 1996. Provenance unknown, first half of the fourth century. - Preface. - Introduction: A. Codicological Reconstruction (Robert G. Babcock); - B. Paleography (Ruth Duttenhöfer); - C. Orthography and Other Scribal Characteristics (K.W.W.); - D. Contents of the Codex (K.W.W.); - E. Metrics (Akihiko Watanabe); - F. Authorship and Date (K.W.W.); - G. Historical Notes (K.W.W.). - Note on Editorial Procedure. - Diplomatic Transcription, Paleographical Notes, and Text. - Commentary. - References. Indexes.

C.R. par Rodney Ast, < http://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2014/2014-02-23.html >. - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 89 (2014) No. 177, pp. 182-185. - W.J. Henderson, CR N.S., 66 (2016) pp. 98-100. - Maria Kanellu, CW 108 (2014) pp. 134-135.
